dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare intrude upon the territory of the Frost Hydra...

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We come in peace, seeking only passage.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? The Frost Hydra knows no peace. Begone!
Pathetic cowards. The Frost Hydra will remember your fear.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We will not back down! Prepare for battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold but foolish. The Frost Hydra will enjoy your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We seek an alliance with the Frost Hydra.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance? Ha! The Frost Hydra has no need for weaklings like you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We offer you tribute and loyalty in exchange for your aid.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Tribute? Loyalty? The Frost Hydra has no equals, only prey.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We understand. We will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise decision. The Frost Hydra cares not for your existence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We are not here to quarrel. Simply passing by.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passing by? The Frost Hydra's domain is not for the likes of wanderers.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Apologies, we will continue on our way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies do not sway the Frost Hydra. Leave or face its wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We will not leave. Stand aside or face us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn fools. The Frost Hydra will make quick work of you.
